main event: A UFO was observed moving from 8 degrees of Polaris to 20 degrees elevation, heading northeast, and eventually faded after 3 minutes.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 33 minutes, The UFO stopped twice during the observation, Its intensity fluctuated during the sighting, The object was initially observed moving at a speed much slower than a meteor, The sighting was associated with the passage of the satellite ECHO I.
witness description: civil engineer and practicing architect, age thirty-five years, observing with his wife
